title: BRIEF-Lafarge Africa Posts Qtrly Profit Before Minimum Tax Of 4.69 Bln Naira
text:
BRIEF-Lafarge Africa Posts Qtrly Profit Before Minimum Tax Of 4.69 Bln Naira

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 28, 2019 09:09)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Lafarge Africa Posts Qtrly Profit Before Minimum Tax Of 4.69 Bln Naira Oct 28 (Reuters) - Lafarge Africa PLC : * LAFARGE AFRICA PLC - QTRLY GROUP REVENUE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS 45.17 BILLION NAIRA VERSUS 72.01 BILLION NAIRA * LAFARGE AFRICA PLC - QTRLY PROFIT BEFORE MINIMUM TAX 4.69 BILLION NAIRA VERSUS LOSS OF 8.02 BILLION NAIRA Source text : company coverage: WAPCO.LG
